title: Noam Chomsky on Firing Line with W.F. Buckley, 1969. (1/7)
description:
Noam Chomsky's 1969 apearence on Firing Line with William F. Buckley. The show was titled "Vietnam and the Intellectuals."

Courtesy of the Hoover Institution.

For more on Noam Chomsky visit
http://www.chomsky.info
